doc.title: Persephone
doc.plot: Persephone is the Greek Goddess of the Underworld and exemplifies the mood and soul of the Autumn season; sadness, death, re-birth, loss, desire and sensuality. This film is a reflection and meditation on the themes and moods of soul that were classic experiences in Ancient Greek Mythology and served as a basic foundation of human wisdom and civilization which are still current and relevant to our own times and experiences.
